description: My apartment is cozy and quaint conveniently located near lots of shopping, bars and restaurants.  It's only a five minute walk to the L subway line which connects to every train in Manhattan.  It's only a ten minute subway ride into the city!
name: Cozy 1 bedroom Apt. in Williamsburg
review: I had a great stay at Liz's place. It is in a great location near shops, restaurants, bars, and the L train. I was commuting into Manhattan so the access to the train was great. Her friend met me for check in and showed me around the apartment. Thanks Liz!
